revised_title: Oblique Propagation of Wave-Packets in a Stratified Doubly Refracting Ionosphere
tldr: The authors develop a generalized magneto-ionic theory to study the oblique propagation of electromagnetic waves through the ionosphere. They investigate the effects of the Earth's magnetic field on wave-packets and the level of reflection in the ionosphere. The study is applicable to any plane-stratified doubly refracting medium and provides insights into the behavior of radio waves in the ionosphere.
